about_the_game:
Considering showing all the fellows that make Holdfast happen your support? We’re most humbled! Here are a few things you’ll gather to display your loyalty to the cause.

It is the community that has brought Holdfast to where it is today and for that, you have our sincere thanks and everlasting gratitude. Rest assured that your kind generosity will be put to good use and bring this genre of roleplay warfare games that all of us are fond of into the limelight. ❤️

In-Game Playthings

● A special medal will show on the scoreboard displaying your loyalty to the cause.

● Unlock the option to only voice ‘Urraah!’ patriotic cheers making your 1800s Russian bayonet charges sound ever-so glorious.

● Unlock a white horse to ride with into battle exclusive only to Loyalists.

● Unlock a set of decorated officer swords. Show your outstanding tastes in the field of battle!


Decorated Swords
» 1796 Pattern Épée
» 1805 Pattern Épée
» Sabre D'Officier D'Infanterie

● Unlock small arms that are ever so slightly better than doing the notorious deed with your bare fists.


Small Arms
» Knife
» Dagger
» 1H Axe
» 1H Adze

● Unlock the Rattus Rattus banner for your playercard.

● Unlock the She's Sinking banner for your playercard.

● Unlock the Rattus Militantis portrait for your playercard.

● Unlock the Trenchman portrait for your playercard.

● Unlock the Loyalist title for your playercard.

Artwork & Soundtracks

● Unique artwork featuring the Battle of San Marcos which served to inspire the coastal siege game mode and massive multiplayer battles.

● Access to the game’s soundtracks composed by the talented Sean Beeson.


Sound Tracks
» A Gentleman's War
» Might of the Prussians

● Access to the great collection of bagpipe tunes that Holdfast features. A grand total of 22 tunes played by Calum Galleitch.
